sentences.en: A lot of preparatory work still needs to be done.
sentences.cn: 还有很多准备工作要做。

sentences.en: A rigorous and comprehensive approach requires some preparatory work.
sentences.cn: 应用严格的、综合的方法需要作某些准备工作.

sentences.en: All the preparatory work has been completed.
sentences.cn: 各项准备工作均已就绪.

sentences.en: At least a year's preparatory work will be necessary before building can start.
sentences.cn: 在开始动工之前至少要做一年的准备工作。

sentences.en: He made his will preparatory to his voyage.
sentences.cn: 他在出航前立下了遗嘱

sentences.en: He used to have a cup of coffee preparatory to his work.
sentences.cn: 在工作之前,他总要喝上一杯咖啡.

sentences.en: I did preparatory exercises before the race.
sentences.cn: 我在赛跑前做了准备运动.

sentences.en: Lenin did a great deal of the preparatory work for this conference.
sentences.cn: 列宁为这次会议作了大量的准备工作.

sentences.en: Political leaders have reached a tentative agreement to hold a preparatory conference next month.
sentences.cn: 政治领导人已就下个月举行预备会议达成初步协定。

sentences.en: preparatory talks to clear the way for a peace settlement
sentences.cn: 为缔结和平协议扫清道路的预备性会谈

sentences.en: she applied her make-up preparatory to leaving.
She lit the oven, preparatory to putting the pie into it.
sentences.cn: 她把烤箱加热，准备把馅饼放进去。

sentences.en: Sloan cleared his throat preparatory to speaking.
sentences.cn: 斯隆清了清嗓子，准备讲话。

sentences.en: The passengers gathered their belongings preparatory to getting off.
sentences.cn: 乘客们收拾自己的东西为下车做准备.

sentences.en: The Preparatory Committee for the conference extends to you our invitation and bids you welcome.
sentences.cn: 会议的筹备委员会向您发出邀请,并致以欢迎.

sentences.en: There is much preparatory work for us to do.
sentences.cn: 我们有许多准备工作要做.

sentences.en: This was where we were to have our preparatory language courses.
sentences.cn: 这就是我们要上语言预备课的地方.

sentences.en: You should pack it up preparatory to sending it by post.
sentences.cn: 在邮寄之前你应该把它包好.

words.tran_cn: 使准备好；使（病人）准备接受手术

trans.tran_cn: 预备的，准备的，筹备的，初步的
trans.tran_en: done in order to get ready for something
